enduranceRecommendation.explanation: Continuous 24/7 writing requires specialized endurance cards to prevent rapid failure.

recordingModes.name: 5.6K 30fps (360°)
recordingModes.notes: Captures spherical video, bitrate reflects combined data streams.

recordingModes.notes: Recording is subject to a heavy crop.

enduranceRecommendation.explanation: Continuous recording requires High Endurance cards to avoid premature failure.
Continuous recording requires High Endurance cards to prevent failure.
Nextbase specifies U3 High Endurance cards to handle 4K loop recording and prevent warranty issues.

recordingModes.name: 2K 60fps (Dual Channel)
recordingModes.notes: Bitrate per channel. Total bitrate is higher.

enduranceRecommendation.explanation: VIOFO mandates U3/V30 High Endurance cards for stable dual-channel 2K recording.
